text: In association football, a caretaker manager is a person who takes over as the manager when either the current manager is not free, or they leave their team."Таблиця відповідностей ліцензій". clffu.org.ua. Access date - 6 June 2023 Caretaker managers can be replaced if a new manager is given a job, or they may become a manager of the team full-time. ==Related pages== *Head coach ==References== Category:Association football Category:Sports occupations
title: Caretaker manager
